synopsis:
Hajime Kindaichi once again becomes embroiled in solving baffling cases and deciphering puzzling crimes that would confound the most seasoned of detectives. Whether it's a gruesome murder and shady circumstances surrounding the Japanese board game Go; a perplexing and macabre case involving a mysterious character, "Rosenkreutz," and blue roses; or blood curdling crimes associated with an urban legend at a winter ski resort â€“ Hajime is out to crack them all!
(Source: YTV)

title.jp: Kindaichi Shounen no Jikenbo Returns 2nd Season
